gui module¶

class gui.SchoolManagementGUI(root)[source]¶

Bases: object

A class to represent the School Management System GUI.

This class sets up a Tkinter-based graphical user interface that allows users to manage students, instructors, and courses in the system. The GUI provides functionality to add, search, delete, and manage records, and it interacts with the database through various operations.

__init__(root)[source]¶

Initializes the GUI and loads data from the database.

Sets up the tabs for students, instructors, and courses.
